ing about Yoketron, Straight Shot freezes. Her expressions change dramatica=

aster Yoketron was killed? Why didn't anyone tell us? Does anyone else know=

r the courage ta tell Tucson in person what his comrade did ta our Sensai! =
"

> 
> " I know you preds are b=
ad news, but wow, that really tips the scales, literally."
>

o gasps.

 IF I HAD KNOWN THAT I WOULD NEVER HAVE ADMITTED TA MY MISTAKE! OHHH ARE YO=

hen again... Ohh boy, Leo, I - think you better be the one ta tell 'em... M=
aster Yoketron was everything ta him, this is gonna really do serious damag=
e ta his emotional circuitry."

h a dramatic flare worthy of a PRIME. He turned

iscussion with HYDRAS, perhaps distance

wn.
